title: Sainz on 'very complicated' 2026 F1 car: 'It occupies a lot of brain space'
summary: Next year's new-generation F1 cars will overload drivers with their technical demands in the first part of the 2026 season, says Carlos Sainz

qa_pairs.question: What major changes are expected for the 2026 Formula 1 season?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Introduction of new-generation cars with increased technical demands.

qa_pairs.question: Which driver expressed concerns about the technical complexity of the 2026 F1 cars?
What impact are the new-generation F1 cars expected to have on drivers in 2026?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They will require more mental focus and adaptation due to their complexity.
